itunes:subtitle: Ross hired DJ Chris Tarantino to remix "At Night She Cries, While He Rides His Steed" into a summertime mashup of the ages. We hope this helps you get through your long rides wherever you may be headed this weekend! Be safe! Buy Ross' New Book "When Dark...
itunes:summary:
Ross hired DJ Chris Tarantino to remix "At Night She Cries, While He Rides His Steed" into a summertime mashup of the ages. We hope this helps you get through your long rides wherever you may be headed this weekend! Be safe!

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It"
